mapper.insert: insert into book_tb (user_id, title, author_comment, serial_day, author, category_id, genre_id, introduction, age) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{authorComment}, #{serialDay}, #{author}, #{categoryId}, #{genreId}, #{introduction}, #{age})
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.title, b.author, b.likes, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.tag_name ORDER BY t.tag_name ASC) AS tags FROM book_tb b LEFT JOIN book_tag_tb bt ON b.book_id = bt.book_id LEFT JOIN tag_tb t ON bt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY b.book_id ORDER BY b.title ASC

SELECT b.title, b.author, b.author_comment, b.introduction, b.book_cover_image, b.serial_day, b.likes, b.age, b.created_at, c.category_name, g.genre_name FROM book_tb AS b JOIN category_tb AS c ON c.category_id = b.category_id JOIN genre_tb AS g ON g.genre_id = b.genre_id WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId};
mapper.update: UPDATE book_tb SET title = #{title}, author_comment = #{authorComment}, introduction = #{introduction}, serial_day = #{serialDay}, age = #{age} WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
update book_tb set SET view = view + 1 where book_id = #{bookId}
